response.job_title: Project Engineer | Hydraulic transient simulation | Automation and Control of Processes
response.summary:
Chemical engineer with experience in projects related to transient and steady-state simulation, risk analysis and integrity of pipelines for transportation of hydrocarbon derivatives for local and external companies from oil and gas sector. 

With particular interests in design, simulation, control and optimization of chemical and biochemical processes. I have experience in performing mass balances as well as reading and construction of BFD, PDF and P&ID diagrams for chemical and oil & gas industries. Passionate for modeling and simulation of upstream and downstream processes of oil and gas industries. 

Knowledge in Sinergy Pipeline Simulator, Aspen HYSYS and Aspen Plus software, as well as  in programming languages and tools such as Python, MATLAB, Simulink.
response.skills: Process Simulation, Hydraulics, Aspen Plus, Aspen HYSYS, English, Project Analysis, Problem Solving, Python (Programming Language), MATLAB, Chemical Engineering, Process Engineering, Process Design, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Oil & Gas

company.name: Process Solutions SAS
company.description: Empresa Especializada en Soluciones Digitales para Automatización, Simulación y Control de Procesos
